data.text: One day, in the afternoon―
data.processed: <story>One day, in the afternoon―

data.text:
I was out on a shopping errand, but I ended up in an unfamiliar 
place. While I was standing there at a loss……
data.processed:
<story>I was out on a shopping errand, but I ended up in an unfamiliar 
<story>place. While I was standing there at a loss……

data.text: Um～, excuse me.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Um～, excuse me.

data.text: Are you perhaps a trainer affiliated with the school?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Are you perhaps a trainer affiliated with the school?

data.text:
Ah, I thought so～. I was pretty sure I'd seen you 
around the campus a few times before.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Ah, I thought so～. I was pretty sure I'd seen you 
<story>around the campus a few times before.

data.text:
By the way, it looks like something's troubling you. 
Is something the matter?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>By the way, it looks like something's troubling you. 
<story>Is something the matter?

data.text:
When Grass Wonder kindly asked, I replied that it was my first 
time coming out this far and I was lost……
data.processed:
<story>When Grass Wonder kindly asked, I replied that it was my first 
<story>time coming out this far and I was lost……

data.text: Oh my, that sounds like quite the predicament!
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Oh my, that sounds like quite the predicament!

data.text: If you'd like, I could lead you back to the school.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>If you'd like, I could lead you back to the school.

data.text:
Yes, I was just about to head back myself. 『The journey is as 
important as the people you meet along the way』♪
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Yes, I was just about to head back myself. 『The journey is as 
<story>important as the people you meet along the way』♪

data.text:
I come here often to buy things for my hobby so, 
I'm familiar with the area. Soo～ just leave it to me.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>I come here often to buy things for my hobby so, 
<story>I'm familiar with the area. Soo～ just leave it to me.

data.text: Well then, shall we set off?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Well then, shall we set off?

data.text:
While accompanied by the kind Uma Musume, Grass Wonder, 
we made our way back towards the school at a leisurely pace……
data.processed:
<story>While accompanied by the kind Uma Musume, Grass Wonder, 
<story>we made our way back towards the school at a leisurely pace……

data.text:
Huu～. If we've made it this far, 
the school should be nearby.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Huu～. If we've made it this far, 
<story>the school should be nearby.

data.text:
The sun has already started setting, hasn't it～? I ended up 
walking at such a carefree pace…… I'm sorry about that.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>The sun has already started setting, hasn't it～? I ended up 
<story>walking at such a carefree pace…… I'm sorry about that.

data.text:
Oh my. Trainer-san, it seems like you're 
someone who can appreciate 『Mono no Aware』.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Oh my. Trainer-san, it seems like you're 
<story>someone who can appreciate 『Mono no Aware』.

data.text:
……in particular, 『Twilight』. The crimson-hued 
sky, each time you look at it, it changes slightly. 
It's quite beautiful because of that.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>……in particular, 『Twilight』. The crimson-hued 
<story>sky, each time you look at it, it changes slightly. 
<story>It's quite beautiful because of that.

data.text:
I feel like I could watch it forever…… 
Because of that, I end up slowing my pace without thinking.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>I feel like I could watch it forever…… 
<story>Because of that, I end up slowing my pace without thinking.

data.text:
While speaking about that, I stood together 
with Grass Wonder, admiring the sky and―
data.processed:
<story>While speaking about that, I stood together 
<story>with Grass Wonder, admiring the sky and―

data.text: (Guuuuuuu)
data.processed: <story>(Guuuuuuu)

data.text: ……Oh dear～.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>……Oh dear～.

data.text:
Fufufuu, no, it's fine. After walking that much, 
it's not unusual to become hungry, is it?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Fufufuu, no, it's fine. After walking that much, 
<story>it's not unusual to become hungry, is it?

data.text:
That's right, I happen to have something perfect 
for that with me. Trainer-san, do you mind if I 
take up just a little bit more of your time?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>That's right, I happen to have something perfect 
<story>for that with me. Trainer-san, do you mind if I 
<story>take up just a little bit more of your time?

data.text:
If you're fine with it, Trainer-san, 
let me treat you to a 『Tea Ceremony』.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>If you're fine with it, Trainer-san, 
<story>let me treat you to a 『Tea Ceremony』.

data.text:
Yes, you could call it an outdoor tea party. Basking in the 
natural light, taking in the scents in the air all while enjoying 
tea. It's quite a refined cultural experience, you know?～
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Yes, you could call it an outdoor tea party. Basking in the 
<story>natural light, taking in the scents in the air all while enjoying 
<story>tea. It's quite a refined cultural experience, you know?～

data.text:
Tea ceremonies are my hobby, you see. The whole 
reason I was out so far was to order some matcha 
and sweets from a store that I fancy.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Tea ceremonies are my hobby, you see. The whole 
<story>reason I was out so far was to order some matcha 
<story>and sweets from a store that I fancy.

data.text:
I happen to have the proper equipment 
with me so…… how about it?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>I happen to have the proper equipment 
<story>with me so…… how about it?

data.text:
I'm glad～♪ Well then, 
I'll get everything prepared.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>I'm glad～♪ Well then, 
<story>I'll get everything prepared.

data.text:
Then, I enjoyed a cup of tea and some elegant 
sweets prepared for me by Grass Wonder.
data.processed:
<story>Then, I enjoyed a cup of tea and some elegant 
<story>sweets prepared for me by Grass Wonder.

data.text: How was it, Trainer-san?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>How was it, Trainer-san?

data.text: Fufuu, I'm glad to hear it.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Fufuu, I'm glad to hear it.

data.text:
Being fulfilling for body and soul 
is one of the good points about tea.
data.name: Grass Wonder

choices.text: Have you been practicing for long?
Have you been practicing for long?

data.processed:
<story>Being fulfilling for body and soul 
<story>is one of the good points about tea.

data.text: Yes, since I was young.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Yes, since I was young.

data.text:
Tea ceremonies, flower arrangement, calligraphy, Japanese dance…… 
oh, and a little training with the Naginata.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Tea ceremonies, flower arrangement, calligraphy, Japanese dance…… 
<story>oh, and a little training with the Naginata.

data.text:
No, no, it's not that impressive～. 
I just really like them all.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>No, no, it's not that impressive～. 
<story>I just really like them all.

data.text:
I was born in America, and both of my 
parents had a deep appreciation for Japan.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>I was born in America, and both of my 
<story>parents had a deep appreciation for Japan.

data.text:
Because of that, I had a lot of exposure to the 
wonders of Japanese culture. It was only natural 
that I would grow an interest in it too.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Because of that, I had a lot of exposure to the 
<story>wonders of Japanese culture. It was only natural 
<story>that I would grow an interest in it too.

data.text:
And back home, I had a teacher that had knowledge of this too, 
so I asked my parents if I could study under them.
data.name: Grass Wonder

choices.text: You really like Japanese culture, huh?
You really like Japanese culture, huh?

data.processed:
<story>And back home, I had a teacher that had knowledge of this too, 
<story>so I asked my parents if I could study under them.

data.text: Yes, of course!
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>Yes, of course!

data.text:
Because of that, courtesy, sincerity, consideration for others…… 
I learned many important things like that.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Because of that, courtesy, sincerity, consideration for others…… 
<story>I learned many important things like that.

data.text:
Well, I say that, but I have a 
lot I still need to work on.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Well, I say that, but I have a 
<story>lot I still need to work on.

data.text:
Someday, I hope to be as refined and elegant, with the dignity 
of a Yamato Nadeshiko…… and to that end, I practice daily.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Someday, I hope to be as refined and elegant, with the dignity 
<story>of a Yamato Nadeshiko…… and to that end, I practice daily.

data.text:
Oh…… I'm sorry, I seem to have gotten quite 
absorbed in our conversation.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
<story>Oh…… I'm sorry, I seem to have gotten quite 
<story>absorbed in our conversation.

data.text: For now, let's return to the school♪
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: <story>For now, let's return to the school♪

data.text:
And so, I parted ways with Grass Wonder 
and headed towards the trainer dorms……
data.processed:
<story>And so, I parted ways with Grass Wonder 
<story>and headed towards the trainer dorms……

data.text:
The Yamato Nadeshiko Uma Musume, Grass Wonder. 
A girl with a gentle smile that held tea ceremonies. 
I wonder how she would run?―
data.processed:
<story>The Yamato Nadeshiko Uma Musume, Grass Wonder. 
<story>A girl with a gentle smile that held tea ceremonies. 
<story>I wonder how she would run?―

data.text: The answer would come unexpectedly quickly.
data.processed: <story>The answer would come unexpectedly quickly.

data.text:
『Notice to all trainers. 
Regarding the next Selection Race』
data.processed:
<story>『Notice to all trainers. 
<story>Regarding the next Selection Race』

data.text:
Among the list of participants 
was the name 『Grass Wonder』
data.processed:
<story>Among the list of participants 
<story>was the name 『Grass Wonder』
